files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,6 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<selector xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android">
+    <item android:state_pressed="true" android:drawable="@drawable/rank_pressed_net1414080903127"/>
+    <item android:state_pressed="false" android:drawable="@drawable/rank_net1414080903127"/>
+
+</selector>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,6 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<selector xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android">
+    <item android:state_pressed="true" android:drawable="@drawable/start_pressed_net1414080903127"/>
+    <item android:state_pressed="false" android:drawable="@drawable/start_net1414080903127"/>
+
+</selector>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -7,7 +7,7 @@
     android:paddingLeft="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin"
     android:paddingRight="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin"
     android:paddingTop="@dimen/activity_vertical_margin"
-    tools:context="edu.hzuapps.androidlabs.Net1414080903127GameActivity">
+    tools:context="edu.hzuapps.androidlabs.homeworks.net1414080903127.Net1414080903127GameActivity">
 
     <ImageButton
         android:layout_width="100dp"
@@ -52,5 +52,53 @@
         android:text="赢家"
         android:id="@+id/Winner"/>
 
+    <TextView
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:id="@+id/player"
+        android:text="玩家"
+        android:textSize="50dp"
+        android:layout_below="@+id/Winner"
+        android:layout_alignParentStart="true"
+        android:layout_marginStart="17dp" />
+
+    <TextView
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:text="系统"
+        android:id="@+id/system"
+        android:textSize="50dp"
+        android:layout_marginEnd="23dp"
+        android:layout_alignBaseline="@+id/player"
+        android:layout_alignBottom="@+id/player"
+        android:layout_alignParentEnd="true" />
+
+    <TextView
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:id="@+id/vs"
+        android:text="VS"
+        android:textSize="50dp"
+        android:layout_below="@+id/system"
+        android:layout_centerHorizontal="true"
+        android:layout_marginTop="36dp" />
+
+    <ImageButton
+        android:layout_width="100dp"
+        android:layout_height="100dp"
+        android:id="@+id/palyerO"
+        android:background="@drawable/white_net1414080903127"
+        android:layout_below="@+id/player"
+        android:layout_alignStart="@+id/player"
+        android:layout_marginTop="17dp" />
+
+    <ImageButton
+        android:layout_width="100dp"
+        android:layout_height="100dp"
+        android:id="@+id/systemO"
+        android:background="@drawable/white_net1414080903127"
+        android:layout_alignTop="@+id/palyerO"
+        android:layout_alignStart="@+id/system" />
+
 
 </RelativeLayout>

@@ -3,22 +3,29 @@
     xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
     android:layout_width="match_parent"
     android:layout_height="match_parent"

-    <Button
+    <ImageButton
         android:layout_width="wrap_content"
         android:layout_height="wrap_content"
-        android:id="@+id/rank"
-        android:text="查看排名" />
-    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/start"
+        android:background="@drawable/start_button_net1414080903127"
+        android:layout_centerVertical="true"
+        android:layout_alignStart="@+id/rank" />
+
+    <ImageButton
         android:layout_width="wrap_content"
         android:layout_height="wrap_content"
-        android:id="@+id/start"
-        android:text="开始游戏"
-        android:layout_below="@id/rank"/>
+        android:id="@+id/rank"
+        android:background="@drawable/rank_button_net1414080903127"
+        android:layout_below="@+id/start"
+        android:layout_alignParentEnd="true"
+        android:layout_marginTop="26dp" />
+
+
 </RelativeLayout>

@@ -1,45 +1,67 @@

+<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
     xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
     android:layout_width="match_parent"
     android:layout_height="match_parent"
-    tools:context="edu.hzuapps.androidlabs.Net1414080903127RankActivity">
-
-        <RelativeLayout
-            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
-            android:layout_height="wrap_content">

-                android:text="名次"
-                android:padding="20dp"/>
-            <TextView

-                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
-                android:layout_toRightOf="@id/ranking"
-                android:id="@+id/grade"
-                android:text="分数"
-                android:padding="20dp" />
-            <TextView
-                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
-                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
-                android:layout_below="@id/ranking"
-                android:id="@+id/first"
-                android:text="first"
-                android:padding="20dp"/>
-            <TextView
-                android:layout_width="wrap_content"
-                android:layout_height="wrap_content"
-                android:layout_toRightOf="@id/first"
-                android:layout_below="@id/grade"
-                android:id="@+id/firstGrade"
-                android:text="grade"
-                android:padding="20dp"/>
-        </RelativeLayout>
-
-
-
-</android.support.constraint.ConstraintLayout>
+    android:paddingBottom="@dimen/activity_vertical_margin"
+    android:paddingLeft="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin"
+    android:paddingRight="@dimen/activity_horizontal_margin"
+    android:paddingTop="@dimen/activity_vertical_margin"
+    tools:context=".homeworks.net1414080903127.Net1414080903127RankActivity">
+    <TextView
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:id="@+id/place"
+        android:text="名次"
+        android:padding="20dp"/>
+    <TextView
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_toRightOf="@id/place"
+        android:id="@+id/getGrade"
+        android:text="得分"
+        android:padding="20dp"/>
+    <TextView
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_below="@id/place"
+        android:id="@+id/first"
+        android:text="1"
+        android:padding="20dp"/>
+    <TextView
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_below="@id/getGrade"
+        android:layout_toRightOf="@id/first"
+        android:id="@+id/firstG"
+        android:padding="20dp"/>
+    <TextView
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_below="@id/first"
+        android:id="@+id/second"
+        android:text="2"
+        android:padding="20dp" />
+    <TextView
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_below="@id/firstG"
+        android:layout_toRightOf="@id/second"
+        android:id="@+id/secondG"
+        android:padding="20dp"/>
+    <TextView
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_below="@id/second"
+        android:id="@+id/three"
+        android:text="3"
+        android:padding="20dp"/>
+    <TextView
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_below="@id/secondG"
+        android:layout_toRightOf="@id/three"
+        android:id="@+id/threeG"
+        android:padding="20dp"/>
 
+</RelativeLayout>
